vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a new Specific Use Permit for retirement housing on property zoned TH-2(A) Townhouse District with deed restriction Z823-379_Exhibit D on a portion, on the east line of South Westmoreland Road, south of Watership Lane
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to a site plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z245-192(TB) / Z-25-000051
